name: %s, computer love
storyline: Flick has not a complete memory. It is a posthuman being, which means it has a computer brain. Each time Flick makes a backup of its mind to free up space, Flick forgets parts of its life. Flick wanders the universe in order to document unknown parts of the cosmos, but what it really wants is to find a friend. It has been centuries since Flick has talked to anyone! One day, when an unknown bug attacks its operative system, Flick falls to the ground in what appears to be a tiny, tiny planet. There, Flick meets a nameless robot that swears it's not alive, and enrolls it in a strange scavenger hunt to (literally) make a friend.
summary:
Flick was born in 2043 but hasn't died in millions of years. Its immortal, genderless body is the ultimate gadget. And that's just one of the amazing products from Parent Company ;), Inc. that can be yours today. Feeling lonely? Download our award-winning <3 Algorithm! Or choose between 6 different space companions, now with new enhanced life spans! Wanna catch up on some old times? Get the brand new Samsara Pod Plus, play your favorite memories on a loop! Flick has not found a single living thing in centuries. Still, the universe is said to have no end, so Flick carries a bowtie sticker on its neck, just in case. 
 
*** 
 
%s, computer love is a narrative-focused adventure game. You play as Flick, a posthuman that explores the universe in hopes of making a friend in a world that has commoditized love and forgotten all about it.
